sentences.en: He has modern ideas in spite of his great age.
sentences.cn: 尽管他年事很高,但思想观念却很入时.

sentences.en: I refused her a divorce, out of spite I suppose.
sentences.cn: 我拒绝和她离婚，就是为了出口恶气。

sentences.en: I wouldn't trust them in spite of all their la-di-da manners.
sentences.cn: 尽管他们处处显得很高雅的样子，我还是不相信他们。

sentences.en: I'm sure he only said it out of spite .
sentences.cn: 我相信他只是为了泄愤才那么说的。

sentences.en: In spite of great peril, I have survived.
sentences.cn: 虽然处境非常危险，我还是挺过来了。

sentences.en: In spite of her hostility, she was attracted to him.
sentences.cn: 尽管自己心存敌意，她还是为他所吸引。

sentences.en: In spite of his anger, his remarks were restrained.
sentences.cn: 他尽管生气, 说的话还是有节制的.

sentences.en: In spite of his disappointment, he managed a weak smile.
sentences.cn: 尽管他很失望，他还是勉强露出一丝淡淡的微笑。

sentences.en: In spite of his illness, he clung tenaciously to his job.
sentences.cn: 尽管有病在身，他仍顽强地坚持工作。

sentences.en: In spite of his vices, he was loved by all.
sentences.cn: 尽管他有缺点, 还是受到大家的爱戴.

sentences.en: In spite of the extremity of her seclusion she was sane.
sentences.cn: 尽管完全与世隔绝，她依然心智健全。

sentences.en: In spite of the recession, profits have galloped ahead.
sentences.cn: 尽管还处于萧条期，利润却迅猛增长。

sentences.en: Kelly loved her husband in spite of the fact that he drank too much.
sentences.cn: 虽然丈夫酗酒，凯莉仍然爱着他。

sentences.en: Oliver smiled in spite of himself.
sentences.cn: 奥利弗不由自主地笑了笑。

sentences.en: She broke it just out of spite.
sentences.cn: 她就是出于恶意把它打破的。

sentences.en: She is still very active, in spite of her advancing years.
sentences.cn: 她尽管年事渐高，仍然十分活跃。

sentences.en: The army were still fighting in spite of heavy casualties.
sentences.cn: 尽管伤亡人员众多,军队仍在继续战斗.

sentences.en: The blunt comment made Richard laugh in spite of himself.
sentences.cn: 这番率直的话让理查德不由自主地大笑起来。

sentences.en: The neighbours throw things over the garden wall just to spite us.
sentences.cn: 邻居把东西扔过花园围墙，故意和我们作对。

sentences.en: They kept going in spite of their fears.
sentences.cn: 他们不顾害怕继续前进

sentences.en: We went out in spite of the rain.
sentences.cn: 尽管下着雨，我们还是出去了。

trans.tran_en: without being affected or prevented by something
without being affected or prevented by something
to deliberately annoy or upset someone
